Quan so lagremas aciduas, e es le cors de aquelas venas las quals so sobre le test del cap deforo, e no comfereys en aquo alcuna causa de la curacio de medicina, e vezes la cara del malaute ja enrogesir e sent en le sieu front deambulacio ayssi cum si era deambulacio de formiguas, e·ls huels de aquel so extenuatz, humitz enayssi que ja les pels de lor son conodutz, e las parpelas so scalfadas per la acuitat de las lacrimas, les antics agro mesties en la curacio de aquelas de aquesta operacio, e nompnero aquela curacio am spassa.	When sharp throats occur and the veins that are above the head of the testicle do not have any cause for healing with medicine, and sometimes the face of the patient swells and they walk as if they had a form of ants, and their throat becomes extended, moist to such an extent that their skin is known, and their scrotum is scalded by the acidity of tears, the ancients treated this condition with this operation, and I name this treatment as "spassa".
E es que tu comandas al malaute rayre les pels les quals son en le sieu front, e aprop inscideys en le front tres fissuras engualment distans segon la longitut del front.	And it is that you command the patient to raise their hair on their forehead, and then make three incisions equally distant according to the length of the forehead.
E si’ la longitut de la fissura cays dos ditz: la una fissura sia engualment distant a la longitut del nas en le mieg loc del front, e la segonda segon la longitut un petit del movement dels lacertz les quals so en le lacrimal, e la tersa del autre part.	And if the length of the incision is two fingers: the first incision should be equally distant from the length of the nose in the middle of the forehead, and the second according to the length of a small movement of the eyelashes which are near the tear duct, and the third on the other side.
E guarda te de la incizio de las arcerias las quals so en dos latz, e elongua la tua ma de la continuacio de amdos las mandibulas.	And be careful when making the incisions of the arteries which are in two places, and stretch out your hand from the continuation of both jaws.
E si’ l’espazi de quascuna inscizio la quantitat de tres ditz ajustatz.	And if the space of each incision is adjusted to three fingers.
E si’ a tu una pessa d’espongua apparelhada o draps seccatz motz am les quals exsiccas le sanc.	And if you have a sponge soaked in vinegar or dry cloths with which you extract the blood.
E aprop entremet le spatum de dos agudas extremitatz, del qual aquesta es la forma de la inscisio de lu:	And introduce the spatula into two sharp edges, of which this is the shape of the incision:
que es de la partida des templas entro a la segonda inscizio.	from the part between the temples to the second incision.
Exxcorja am aquel tota la codena la qual es entre dos incizios am le ciphac le qual es sobre le os, e aprop fay aquo de la inscizio migera entro a la segonda inscisio.	Remove the entire chain that is between two incisions with the saw which is on the bone, and do what remains of the median incision to the second incision.
E aprop stratz ne aquest spatum e entromet en la primieyra inscizio autra vetz un autre instrument le qual es apelat cutellar, agut de una part e del autre no agut.	And use this spatula again and enter the first incision with another instrument which is called a scalpel, sharp on one side and not sharp on the other.
E pausa le latz de aquel agut deves la carn annexa deves la codena, e le latz de lu leon dintz le os, e empelley aquel entro que pervengua a la fissura migera, e abscindeys am aquel totz les vaysels que descendo del cap als huels.	Pause the incisions of that sharp area, the attached flesh should be bound, and the latches of it the bone, and push it into the gaping fissure, and bind all vessels that descend from the head to the heels with it.
Mays que sia continuada la inscizio ad aquo appar de la codena, e aprop fay aquo en la fissura migana entro al autra fissura.	May it continue uninterrupted along the attached flesh and bind it into the other gaping fissure. (This line refers to continuing the suture or stitching process)
E pus que corr del sanc quantitat engual, exprem les locs de las pessas del sanc congilat.	And when the correct amount of blood has flowed out, press the places of the blood clots with a cloth. (This line refers to applying pressure to stop any bleeding)
E aprop pausa en quascuna fissura calgua de coto vielh, e pausa sobre aquels polvils enbegutz en vi e oli e vi agre, e vegas que no endevengua apostema caut.	And bind each gaping wound that is not fully healed, and bind over those pus-filled blisters that have been soaked in wine and oil and vinegar, and ensure that no abscess forms cautiously. (This line refers to dressing or bandaging open wounds)
E en le tertz dia deslia le liament e aministra gran enfusio de aygua cauda o tebeza, e aprop cura aquo am enguent bazilicon am oli rozat e autres entro que las plaguas sian sanadas.	On the third day, remove the linen and administer large infusions of hot water or tea, and treat it with basil oil and rose oil, and others until the sores are healed. (This line refers to changing bandages and using medicinal oils)
Capitol .v.	Chapter V. (This indicates a new section in the medical treatise)
De la cura de lagramas per catartz e als huels descendentz de las partidas dedintz del cap.	On the treatment of abscesses by purges and the sores that descend from within the head. (This line indicates a new topic, specifically treating abscesses and sores originating in the head)
Quan ad alcu veno catartz agutz e continuantz, e vezes les huels del malaute extenuatz petitz, e ja le reguardament de lor es debelitat, e las palpebras ulceradas e de lor cazo les pels, e en le preon del cap es dolor aguda ledent e extrenutacio consequent, lahoras sapias per aquestz accidentz que las materias e catartz no veno sino de motas venas de las partidas dedintz procedent.	When an acute and persistent catarrh or a series of small sores in the patient's body occurs, and their weakness is noticeable, and the eyelids are ulcerated and peeled back, and there is sharp pain at the front of the head along with extreme pressure, then you should know from these symptoms that the matter and catarrh do not come from any other source than the veins in the brain. (This line provides additional information about recognizing when a catarrh or sores are coming from the brain)
E la milhor curacio en aquels es aquesta: que comandes al malaute que raza lo sieu front, e aprop inscideys en aquel una fissura al mieg loc del front, un petit per la latitut (e comensa am la fissura del templar senestre entro al dextre templar; e sia inscisio entro al os; e eslongua la tua ma dels lacertz del templas lesquals son maugutz deves la mastigacio), entro que sia le os descubert.	And the best treatment for these is as follows: command the patient to shave their forehead, and make an incision in that place at the midpoint of the forehead, a small one along its length (and begin from the left temple to the right temple; and let the incision go through the bone; extend your hand from the temples which should be avoided due to masticatory muscles), until the bone is exposed.
Exsicca tot le sanc am espongua o am drap secc e aprop repleys entre las doas labias de la fissura am coto vielh o am draps de li.	Dry all the blood with a sponge or dry cloth, and fill between the two lips of the incision with cotton or dry cloth.
E aprop estrenh desus am polvils enbegutz en vi e oli per so que no endevengua apostema caut.	And bind over it with pus-filled blisters in wine and oil to prevent abscesses from forming cautiously. (This line refers to dressing or bandaging the incision to prevent infection)
E quan deslias aquo e veses que l’apostema ja es diminuit, lahoras cove que fregua le os entro que comensa en lu nayser carn, e aprop cura aquel am regiment exsiccatiu le qual fassa neysser la carn, ayssi cum si tu prenes de farina de froment dos partidas e de colofania quatre partidas e mescla o, e de lor sia fayt emplastre e sia aministrat en aquestas plaguas a de la carn nativitat.	When you remove the dressing and see that the abscess has decreased in size, then it is necessary to cauterize the bone starting where the muscle tissue begins, and treat it with an astringent remedy that promotes healing, for example if you take two parts of wheat flour and four parts of colophony and mix them together, make a plaster from it and administer it to these sores in order to promote healing of the native tissue. (This line refers to cauterizing the bone to prevent infection and using an astringent remedy to promote healing)
Capitol .vi.	Chapter VI. (This indicates a new section in the medical treatise)
De la cura de aquo que catz en las aurelhas.	On the treatment of that which catarrh occurs in the ears. (This line indicates a new topic, specifically treating catarrhs in the ears)
Tota causa que catz en las aurelhas es una de quatre specias, quar o es peyra mineral o causa semblant a peyra, ayssi cum ferr e veyre, o es de planta ayssi cum ceze o fava, o es causa fluxtibla ayssi cum aygua e vi agre e a lor semblantz, o alcuna bestia.	The entire cause of catarrh in the ears is one of four types: either it is a mineral poison or similar to poison such as iron and lead, or it is from plants such as cheese or beans, or it is from fluid-like substances such as water and vinegar and their likes, or from animals. (This line provides information about the various causes of catarrh in the ears)
E donc quan peyra catz en l’aurelha o autra causa semblant de aquelas causas que no ajustan ne creysso en l’aurelha, e pausa la aurelha al solelh, e si vezes la peyra, lahoras distilla en aquela alcuna causa de oli violat o sizami, e aprop aministra la extraccio de lu, e fay le stornudar am condizi, e oppila las nars deve le aveniment de stornutacio.	Therefore when poison or another substance similar to these causes that do not fit the ear, and if the poison is visible, distill it in some volatile oil such as oil of roses or sage, and administer the extraction of it, make him sneeze with appropriate conditions, and open the nostrils to promote sneezing. (This line provides guidance on treating catarrh caused by poison or other substances that do not fit the ear)
E aprop pausa en le circuit de la aurelha alscunas pessas de drap o lana, e dextendas la aurelha a las partidas desus, quar motas veguadas es foro-getada am aquestas causas.	And bind the circumference of the ear with some fabric or wool patches and stretch the ear open at its edges, since many times it is forgotten with these causes. (This line provides additional guidance on treating catarrh caused by poison or other substances that do not fit the ear)
E si no n’es getada, lahoras aministra extraccio de lu am le instrument apelat gesti epicicarios subtil del qual aquesta es la forma:	If it is not forgotten, then administer the extraction of it with the instrument called gesti epicicarios, which has the following form: (This line indicates that the next lines will describe the specific instrument used to extract the poison or substance causing the catarrh)
E si es foro-getada am gesti, bo es; e sino, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am onci subtil de pauca duplicacio.	If it is forgotten with the gesti, that is good; otherwise, administer the extraction of it with an instrument called the uncus subtil, which has a small double bend. (This line describes the specific instrument used to extract the poison or substance causing the catarrh)
E donc si no es foro-getada per aquo, lahoras fay una canula de aram e entromet la extremitat de la canula en le trauc de la aurelha e claus a l’enviro de la canula am cera e am oli mollificada per so que no sia ubert sino la canula.	Therefore if it is not forgotten, make a cannula of silver and insert the end of the cannula into the opening of the ear and close the environment of the cannula with wax and softened oil to prevent any leakage except for the cannula. (This line provides guidance on how to use the uncus subtil instrument to extract the poison or substance causing the catarrh)
E aprop extratz am le tieu vent am fort atraccio, quar tropas veguadas cum aquo que havem recontat.	And draw it out gently with your breath and strong attraction, since many times it has been reported that this helps. (This line provides guidance on how to use the cannula instrument to extract the poison or substance causing the catarrh)
Mays si no es foro-getada en aquesta manieyra, lahoras pren de halka alumbat o de vecz aparelhat am le qual son preses les ausels una patita quantitat, e pausa aquel en la extremitat de ray, e aprop envolopa sobre aquel coto decentment pausat.	If it is not forgotten in this way, then take some alum or white lead that has been prepared with the apparatus used to catch birds, and place it at the end of the ray, and bind it over that area decently bound. (This line provides guidance on how to use a different instrument to extract the poison or substance causing the catarrh)
E aprop entromet aquel en le trauc de la aurelha am facilitat, e aprop excicca la aurelha de la humiditat.	Approach the ear canal gently with ease, and then carefully remove the earwax from moisture.
E donc si no es foro-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recontadas, lahoras tu coyta a talhar aquela denant que endevengua apostema caut o espasme.	And therefore, if you do not forget all the causes that have been mentioned, then you should seek to remove that which is causing abscess or cramp.
E la manieyra de talhar aquela es que tu al comensament sancnes le malaute de la vena sephasica e extratz del sanc segon la mannieyra de la vertut de lu, e aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas e converteys l’aurelha a las partidas desus, e fen am petita fissura en la razit de la aurelha deves lo greys de lu en le loc be premegut de lu.	The method of removing that is to first lance the patient from the saphenous vein and draw blood as per its virtue, then hold the instrument between your thumb and index finger and turn the earwax towards the upper parts, making a small hole in the base of the ear canal where the pressure should be applied.
E sia la fissura de figura lunar entro que pervengua a la peyra, e, la peyra atrobada, osta aquela si podes am instrumentz apropriatz; e aprop cos la fissura en aquela hora am velocitat, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	The incision should be in the shape of a crescent moon that reaches the bone, and, once the bone is broken, remove it if possible with suitable instruments; then sew up the incision at that time with speed, and heal it until it is healed.
E si la causa cazent en la aurelha es un dels gras que creysso e so inflatz, lahoras aministra la curacio e la extraccio de lu; mays si no obezeys a tu ad eyssiment, lahoras tu pren spatum teune subtil segon aquesta forma:	If the cause is in the earwax is one of the fats that grows and swells, administer treatment and removal of it; but if you do not succeed with your efforts, then you should take thin cotton wool according to this form:
e aministra am aquel la abscizio de aquel gra lo qual es cazut en l’aurelha.	and administer the aspiration of that fat that has formed in the earwax.
E no fassas aquo quan cogitas que aquel ja es humectat per la vapor del aurelha, e pausa aquel en motas pessas, e prop extratz ne aquelas am les oncis o am gesti subtil, o ab inscizio ayssi co dit havem, quar es alleujada la extraccio de lu.	And do not perform this when you think that it is already moistened by the vapor of the earwax, and wait for it to settle into clumps, and then remove them with scissors or fine tweezers, or with such an incision as I have described, because the removal of it will be relieved.
Mays en l’aygua la qual es intrada en l’aurelha cove que·l malaute use de sternutacio am condizi al comensament, e omple la sieua aurelha am alcu coto vielh, e jagua sobre aquela aurelha en la qual es l’aygua, e si per aquo es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, lahoras pren tropas peyras teunas e leons segon la longitut del dit, e calfa aquelas en le foc un pauc, e le pacient entrometa una de aquelas en le trauc de la sua aurelha e saute sobre la un pe sieu de aquela partida e percussia am una autra peyra sobre la peyra la qual es dintz la aurelha.	But in water that enters the earwax, it is necessary for the patient to sneeze at the beginning and fill his ear with old cotton, and rub over the ear where the water is, and if this is done, good; otherwise, take many small pebbles thin and long according to the length of the finger, heat them in the fire a little, and have the patient insert one of these into the canal of his ear and jump on one foot from that side and strike another pebble on the pebble that is inside the ear.
Donc no cesse aquo am peyra entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada.	So do not stop with pebbles until all the water has been removed.
E ja l’aygua sira foro-getada enayssi que tu prenguas de papier o de gonc .i., e met la una extremetat de lu en l’aurelha e estendas l’autre extremitat am foc entro que sia comburit le may de lu.	And once the water is removed, take paper or gauze. and put one end of it in the ear and stretch the other end towards the fire until the cotton burns as much as possible.
E prop met i autre gonc e fay aquo tantas veguadas entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada, e stratz aquel am canula ayssi co desus es dit de la peyra extrasadora.	Then put another piece of gauze and perform this many times until all the water has been removed, and strain it through a canal as described above for the pebble extractor.
Mays en la extraccio de bestia intrant en aquela aurelha, si es a petit cos, ayssi piussa e a lu semblant, cura aquel ayssi cum havem dit en la divisio; mays si es de gran cos la qual causa apar al sen del vezement, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am gesti e oncis, e la causa de lu es pus leugiera de totas las autras causas que cazo en l’aurelha.	But in the removal of a foreign body entering that earwax, if it is small, this can be done easily and similarly, treat it as described in the division; but if it is large which causes the swelling of the eardrum, administer the removal of it with forceps and scissors, and the cause of this is easier to deal with than all other causes that occur in the earwax.
Mays en la extraccio de verm engendrat en la aurelha, quan tu curas aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e en le tractat de distillacios e no comfereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que tu reguardes la aurelha al solelh.	But in the removal of worms generated in the earwax, when you treat it as described in the division and in the treatment of distillations and do not achieve success, then you must observe the ear towards the sun.
E donc si apar aqui alcuna causa dels verms, lahoras extratz aquel am gesti o am onci subtils, mays si no apar deguna causa, lahoras pren una canula dejos streyta e desus ampla de la qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if any cause of worms appears, remove it with forceps or fine tweezers, but if no cause is apparent, take a canal that is narrow at the bottom and wide at the top in this form:
E entromet la extremitat subtil en la aurelha segon la quantitat la qual suffertar puesca le malaute; e aprop sucgeys am aquela per succio fort, e fay aquo motas veguadas, entro que totz les verms sian foro-gitatz.	Insert the narrow end into the ear according to the amount that the patient can bear; and carefully suck it out with a strong suction, and perform this many times, until all the worms are removed.
Mays si no obezeysso a tu al ayssiment, lahoras tu opila e claus en le circuit de la canula am cera ayssi cum havem dit; lahoras aministre distillacios las quals han ja esproadas les antics en la curacio dels verms, e atrobaras aquo en le tractat de distillacios.	But if you do not succeed with your efforts, you can use oil and stop up the circuit of the canal with wax as described; administer distillations which have already been tried in the treatment of worms, and apply it in the treatment of distillations.
E sia la tua efusio am la qual efundas les olis medicinas en la aurelha am aquest strument del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	Your effusion with which you infuse the medical oils into the ear with this instrument, its form is:
E fay aquela de argent o de eram, dejos streyt, en le qual sia un petit trauc, e am pla desus.	Make it of silver or brass, narrow at the bottom, with a small hole in the center and flat on top.
E donc sia cum empellent a que es en la conquavitat de la canula de continent aqui on sira necessari.	And ensure that it is curved to fit the concavity of the infusion canal where it will be necessary.
E si vols, pren le ray e envolveys en la extremitat de lu decentment coto, e aprop gieta oli en la concavitat del auziment, o suc de alcuna herba, o aquo que vols de aquestas medicinas en la canula — e aquela es en la aurelha —, e aprop entromet le ray am coto desus e exprem am la tua ma aquel am compressio temprada de lu entro que l’oli sia expellit en la concavitat del auziment e le malaute senta le oli dedintz.	If you wish, take the rod and cover its end properly with a suitable cloth, then pour oil or juice from any herb, or whatever medicine you want into the infusion canal - this is in the ear -, and insert the rod with the proper pressure and compress it gradually until the oil is expelled into the concavity of the eardrum and the patient feels the oil inside.
E aquo que sia enfundut en la aurelha sia ja scalfat am foc un petit.	That which is infused in the ear should already be heated slightly with fire.
E guarda te que la causa la qual distillaras en l’aurelha no sia trop frega, quar las medicinas de aurelha no suffertan aquo.	And be careful that the cause you will distill in the ear is not too hot, because the substances of the earwax do not tolerate this.
Capitol .vii.	Title VII.
De curacio de opilacio de aurelhas.	On the treatment of auricle excision (removal).
Alcunas veguadas alcus enfantz yeysso dels ventres de lors mayres no-perforatz, e aquo ja accideys en alcus homes, opilacio en le meat de la aurelha per plagua o per carn nada en aquela; e aquesta opilacio alcunas veguadas es fayta en le preon del trau de la aurelha la qual no consiec le vezement, e alcunas veguadas es en las partidas defora.	Some warts grow out of the bellies of the elderly men without perforating, and this condition sometimes occurs in some men, an excision in the auricle's tissue due to a wound or lack of tissue at that site; and this excision is sometimes performed in the area before the ear lobe that does not heal, and sometimes it is outside of the partitions.
E aquela que accideys en le preon de lu, la qual no comprehen le vezement, es en las majors disposicios de dificil sanacio.	The one that occurs in the area before the ear lobe that does not heal is more difficult to cure.
E en aquela en qual consegueys le vezement, cove que tu pauses la aurelha del malaute al solelh e reguarda en aquela.	And in the one where healing occurs, you should keep the patient's wart on the sole and watch it.
E donc si vezes oppulacio apparent, obre aquela am espatum subtil del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	Therefore, if an excision is observed to have healed, open that with a thin spatula in this form:
Si’ la extremitat de lu en la qual sia petita la latitut, del qual la una partida sia aguda e l’autra no; e le spatum sia de dos latz leon per so que no fassa lizio al aurelha.	If the area to be excised has a small width and one side is sharp and the other is not; and the spatula should be two leopard lengths wide so that it does not damage the wart.
E donc si la opilacio es per carn nascuda en la aurelha o en le meat de lu, lahoras te aquela am oncis subtils e incidiys aquela vehement facilitat entro que sia ostada tota la carn.	And if the excision is due to tissue born in the auricle or its surrounding area, then make a shallow and wide incision, cutting through the tissue as quickly as possible while leaving all the tissue intact.
E si opilacio es en le preon de la aurelha, lahoras pren ray subtil leon e escalfa aquel am foc un pauc, e aprop met aquel en le meat de l’aurelha.	And if the excision is in the area before the auricle, take a thin wire a lion's length and heat it slightly with fire, then place it in the auricle tissue.
E donc si as scentit oppulacio am aquo que le malaute atroba am facilitat, per gravetat de ausir, esforsa la oppressio de lu am facilitat; e guarda te que no plagues les nervis del aurelha.	And if you observe an excision with what the patient experiences relief, because of pain, release the pressure on it with ease; and be careful not to injure the nerves of the auricle.
E aprop pausa en l’aurelha drap de li segon la quantitat del ample del trauc lo qual tu as envolvutz en l’enguent egipciac; e fay aquo per alcus jorns entro que sias segur de la consolidacio de la plagua; o que prenguas qualgua e enfon aquela en ayguaros e pulveriza sobre lu segi trissat e usa de lu; e si vezes la aurelha ja esser apostemada, lahoras cove que tu estraguas la qualgua e permutes aquela am autra qualgua la qual tu envoloparas en cerot que sia fayt am oli rozat, entro que sia le apostema caut cedat; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then you place a linen cloth on the excised area according to the size of the wound that you have wrapped in Egyptian balm; and do this for several days until you are sure of the healing of the wound; or take some herb and place it in warm water and grind it, then apply it as a poultice and use it; and if you see the excised area already healed, then you must remove the herb and replace it with another that you will wrap in beeswax that has been made with rose oil, until the cauterized wound is healed; and take care of it until it is cured.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras submergeys esponga o drap en aygua frega e pausa sobre la aurelha, e usa del autra curacio la qual restrengeys le flux del sanc, la qual es dita en le tractat de distillacio.	But if there is bleeding, immerse sponge or cloth in warm water and place it on the excised area, and use the other treatment that stops the bleeding, which is called in the distillation treatise.
Capitol .viii.	Title VIII.
De cura de athezil le qual endeveno a las palpebras.	On the care of athazel, which affects the eyelids.
Athezil les quals endeveno a las paupebras dels huels alcuna veguada so humitz, alscunas veguadas son secs.	Athazel is sometimes moist and other times dry in the eyes.
Donc cove que tu tenguas aquels am tenhalhas o am onci, e inscindas aquels am espatum de las suas razitz, e aprop pausa sobre les locs segi trissat.	Therefore, you must have them with tweezers or scissors, and cut them with the spatula of their roots, and place a poultice on them as described above.
Mays si dolor am flux de sanc veno, lahoras tu cauteriza aquels am cauteri lanticular subtil.	But if pain with bleeding occurs, you cauterize them with a fine lancet cautery.
E la milhor cauterizacio es aprop las inscizios e tropas veguadas retornam quan reman alcuna causa de sas razitz; e quan so cauterizadas am foc, aquelas razitz son comburidas e no retornan.	The best cauterization is near the incisions and when the wounds heal properly, they do not return; and when cauterized with fire, the roots are burned and they do not return.
Capitol .ix.	Title IX.
Cura de grandeyssa que veno a las palpebras dels huels.	Treatment of swelling that occurs in the eyelids of humans.
Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alcuna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.	Some causes that resemble swelling in the eyelids of humans are characterized by their intensity and duration, and because of this swelling, they are called swellings.
E es agreguacio de humiditat grossa en la palpebra dejos e desus.	It is an accumulation of thick moisture in the eyelid above and below.
Donc la opperacio en lor es que consideras lahoras si la grandissia es procedent en lu en aquo que apar de la palpebra e es mauguda a tota partida; e la causa de lu es leugiera.	Therefore, the operation is that you examine if the swelling is increasing in the area appearing from the eyelid and spreading all over; and the cause of it is light.
Donc fen sobre aquela am fissura per la latitut, e aprop escorga aquela de tota partida am facilitat entro que evasesca, e aprop suspen aquela am onci e abscindeys aquela.	Therefore, make an incision in the swelling with a scalpel and remove it from all sides with ease until it drains, and then suspend it with a hook and cut off the affected area.
Mays si a tu no es apparelhada la incizio de lu si no pus que penetras la palpebra am inscizio pauc a pauc, lahoras aquo no notz en deguna causa.	But if you are not prepared for the incision of it, do not push too hard so that you pierce the eyelid with a small incision, otherwise you will not notice any effect.
E si la figura es gran, lahoras tu l’ajusta am sutura; e cura aquela entro que sia sanada.	And if the figure is large, then adjust it with stitches; and take care of it until it heals.
E si es pauca, a tu no sobrevindra mal per aquela quar l’anguent de lu restaura aquela e encarna.	And if it is small, you will not suffer harm from the puncture since the heat of it restores and fills it in.
E si la grandissia es declinant a las partidas dedintz de la palpebra deves la superficia dedintz, lahoras evesa la palpebra e suspen la grandissia am onci, otra que tu indigescas de incizio, e prem aquela de tota part, e si la palpebra per inscizio es alonguada, aquo no notz en deguna causa.	And if the swelling is decreasing within the eyelid, then shave the area inside the eyelid, and lift the swelling with a hook, one that you do not need to incise, and press it from all sides, and if the eyelid is elongated due to an incision, you will not notice any effect.
E aprop la incizio, lava le huel am aygua salada; e cura le loc am aquo que encarna entro que sia sanat.	Then make the incision, wash the wound with salt water; and take care of it until it heals.
Capitol .x.	Chapter X.
De la cura axcirnah en la palpebra desus del huel.	Treatise on the cure of an eyelid abscess.
Axcirnath es grays le qual es engendrat en las tunicas de la palpebra desus, e majorment endeve als enfantz, agrava les huels de aquels et accideyso a lor catartz le mayti; e no podon reguardar la claror del solelh per aquo quar lagremas se coytan ad aquels.	An abscess occurring on the eyelid above, which is generated in the tunica of the eyelid, especially in children, worsens the eyes of those and contributes to their catarrh more; and they cannot look at the light of the sun because tears flow into them.
E per so tu vezes aquels jaser sobre les lors caras tot temps, e sobre les lors caras dormen; e so a las palpebras de lor dejos les sobrecils humidas, las quals ja ha cuberta imflacio, e iminencia de accernac apparent es en l’uelh; e que quant tu premes le loc am les tieus ditz, tu centes accernac entro aquels.	And you often find them on the cheeks all the time, and they sleep with their faces on their cheeks; and the underside of their eyelids is moist, which has already been inflamed, and the imminence of infection is apparent in the eye; and whenever you press the area with your fingers, you feel pus coming out into them.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	And there is some method of operation in the one where the patient bends their head towards you and lays a piece of cloth over it, and boil water, and make a circle according to the amount that contains arsenic on all sides, and place that over it and press it with your fingers all around so that pus is accumulated in the middle of the circle, and then make an incision in the middle of the moisture at the wound and the wound should not be larger than the wound made during a lanceotomy.
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	But in the former case it is necessary that you cut open the wound completely until you reach the pus, because in the most serious cases, pus will be drained through an incision according to the shape of white cheese.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	Therefore, you remove it with cloths that you have wrapped between your fingers on the sides and turn it between your right and left hands until it is dispersed.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	And be careful not to close the incision because with pus you will not reach the eye and damage it.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	But if pus does not appear at the beginning of the incision, but you notice that it is present in the incision, then close a small part of the incision with ease until pus appears; and remove it as I have said; submerge cloths in water and wipe it and place them on the area and tighten them with powders.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	And also, those who suffer from salt and wipe it in the concavity of the incision to remove what remains of the moisture.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And take care of it until it heals.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	But if an abscess occurs in the cauterized area, then take care of it with approved plasters until it heals.
Capitol .xi.	Chapter XI.
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	Methods of touching the eye.
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	When in the eyelids of eyes that are caused by tightening of the natural eyelashes and are ancient, you should apply them to the eye and make methods of diseases such as persistent tears and softening of the eyelids and cloth inside until it causes destruction of the eye which is called touching the eye; and it is cured in four ways: either with cautery by fire; or with acute medicine as mentioned earlier in the chapter on cauterization; or it is treated with touch by incision and suturing; or with canes as I will say.
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	And therefore it is necessary that you turn the patient's head towards you; then turn the eyelid of the eye with your left hand, and if it is turned, that is good; and if not, insert a needle into the area where there is pus behind the eyelid, and make the needle penetrate through the area above it, and what is - near the edge of the eyelid where the lashes are - near the lashes, and pull the thread above the eyelid with your right hand, and turn it towards the ray.
E aprop fen en la partida dedintz de la palpebra dejos les pels ajustatz am spatum inscidentz del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal mendre; e aprop extratz le fiel e pausa dejos la palpebra polvilhs petitz de coto o de drap, e aprop senha sobre la palpebra am tenta, e sia ayssi cum figura de fuelha de mirt.	And make an incision in the corner of the eyelid behind the lashes, and drain the lacrimal major into the lacrimal minor; and remove the thread and place it beneath the eyelid with small powder or cloth, and then sew it over the eyelid like a fig leaf of myrtle.
Mays empero cove que sia la figura segon la quantitat de helevacio de la palpebra, quar aquo ja es diversificat en les homes, quar de aquels es le quals indigeys que sia inscidit de la palpebra gran quantitat segon la quantitat per la qual la palpebra es mollificada.	However, it is necessary for the figure to be shaped according to the degree of swelling of the eyelid, because it has been diversified among men, because there are those who require incision of the eyelid in a large quantity according to the amount by which the eyelid is softened.
E aprop fen am le spatum sobre las doas linhas las quals has senhadas, e comensa del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal menor.	Then draw an arch over both lines that you have marked, and start from the greater lacrimal to the lesser one.
E si’ la tua fissura prop dels pels naturals ayssi cum es la grossetut del rey.	And if your incision is near the natural furrow as is the thickness of a coin.
E aprop met le onci en un dels dos angles de la codena, e aprop excoria aquela tota, e aprop ajusta am la scitura las doas labias am gula o fiel de lana subtil, e abstergeys le sanc, e fay adherir aquo que superflueys dels fiels sobre dos sobrecils am alcunas causas enviscans, si voles far aquo, e sino, non cures.	Then place the coin in one of the two corners of the wound, and scrape off all that layer, then adjust the incision with a thin scissor or fine needle, wash the blood away, and make excess hair on both eyebrows adhere to each other using some sticky substances, if you wish to do so, otherwise do not treat it.
E aprop leyssa la sutura dels fiels entro a tres dias o quatre, e aprop cura aquo.	Stitch the hairs together within three or four days and take care of them.
E si vols, layssa la plagua ses sutura, e cura aquela am aquo que exsicca e constrenh, quar la palpebra es alevada deves la sigillacio de la plagua e la agreguacio de lu; mays sutura es milor E donc aysso diysso les antics de taxanir.	If you wish, leave the wound unsutured, and treat it with something that dries and constricts, because the eyelid is swollen due to the sealing of the wound and its accumulation; however, stitching is better, and therefore the ancients preferred this.
Mays empero en lu sia sollicitut sobre le malaute, e es de bona operacio, e no es en lu temor.	However, it should be cautioned for the patient, and it is a good action, and there is no need to fear.
E es autra manieyra en taxmir, e es que senhes sobre la palpebra figura ayssi cum fuelha de mirt, e aprop eleva la palpebra am tres uncis segreguatz e congreguatz segon aquesta forma:	Another method of treatment is to draw a figure on the eyelid like holly leaves, and then raise the eyelid with three separated and joined needles according to this form:
Mays si no es possible aquo, tener les uncis, e aquo no es engualhat, lahoras pren una agula en la qual haia fil e met aquela en le mieg de la figura, e entromet le autre fiel prop le lacrimal major, e·l fiel segon prop le lacrimal mendre, e ajusta entre les tieus ditz les fiels am equalitat, e aprop am aquels eleva la tua ma am elevacio engual, eleva tota la codena sobre la qual es senhat ayssi cum havem recomtat.	If it is not possible to do this, hold the needles and do not let them touch each other, then take a needle with thread and insert it in the middle of the figure, and put the other needle near the greater lacrimal, and the third needle near the lesser one, adjusting them between the two as evenly as possible, and lift your hand with that elevation, lift the entire wound area above which is marked in the way we have recommended.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then adjust the two sides of the wound with stitches and take care of it until it heals.
Mays si accideys apostema deves la tua inscizio o la tua fissura, seda aquel apostema am cerot e a lu semblantz, e am enguentz.	If an abscess should occur in your incision or wound, treat it with hot irons and similar instruments, and with warm water.
E alcunas veguadas endeve a la palpebra que·ls sieus pels sian convertitz, adonc cove que tu uses en aquela de aquo que havem dit de inscizio; mays sutura en quascus es mays artificial.	Sometimes hairs grow into the eyelid, so it is necessary to use what has been said about incision; however, stitching is more artificial.
Ataxinir am cannas es segon aquesta forma:	Treat with reeds in this way:
e es que tu convertas la palpebra e scindas la figura qu’es dedintz segon que he recontat; e aprop per art fay doas cannas o doas astelas subtils de las quals longitut sia segon la longitut de la palpebra e la latitut de lor sia mendra de la latitut del spatum.	and you turn the eyelid and cut the figure inside as I have described; then take two reeds or fine sticks whose length is the same as that of the eyelid and the width of them is smaller than that of the wound.
E tu ja has inscidit en las extremitatz de quascunas partidas, la on tenes les fils.	And you have already made incisions at the ends of each divided area, where the threads are.
Aprop agregua quascuna am subtilitat subre aquo que superflueys de la palpebra del huel, e constres las cannas de quascunas partidas am fort strictura, e layssa aquela per alcus jorns, quar la codena per la strictura morira e sira denegada e se poyrira entro que per si meteyssa cayra.	Moisten each area with a thin solution made of the excess eyelid skin and tighten the reeds of each divided area with strong pressure, then leave it for some days, because the wound will die due to the constriction and become necrotic and eventually fall off by itself.
Mays si es tardat, lahoras trenca la am las toroyras, e aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanat.	If it takes too long, then break the reeds with thorns, and take care of the wound until it heals.
Donc cum es solidada, la palpebra es elevada e les pels no pungo.	Therefore, when the eyelid is raised, the hairs do not penetrate.
E aquesta es la forma de doas cannas las quals faras segon aquesta forma:	And this is the form of two reeds that you will make in this way:
e haia la quantitat de la longitut e de la latitut ni mays ni mens.	and have the length and width neither more nor less.
Capitol .xii.	Chapter XII.
De elevacio de pels pungentz en le huel am agula quan le pel es dur.	This line seems to suggest a method for dealing with hairs that are causing discomfort or pain in the eyelid, using a needle when the hair is tough. The exact meaning of this sentence may require further context.
Quan son pels no-naturals, durs e aspres e pungentz les huels, lahoras la operacio en lu es que tu prenguas agula subtil e pauses en aquela fiel de ceda subtil e leon, e aprop que tu ajustes las extremitatz de lu e nozes quascu en manieyra mot subtil.	When non-natural hairs are tough, harsh and painful to the eyelid, perform the operation by taking a thin needle and placing it on the soft leather or linen thread, and ensure that you adjust the ends of it carefully and gently.
E sia la longitut dels fiels de quantitat de una palma.	The length of the needles should be equal to one span (about nine inches).
E aprop tu compon2 autre fiel subtil dejos lu en breu, e nuza las extremitatz de aquel si tu·t vols.	Take another thin needle and place it near it for later use, and cut the ends of it if you wish to do so.
E aprop pause le malaute le sieu cap en le tieu se, e sia prop del solelh per que la tua obra sia declarada, quar es operacio subtil e menuda.	Place the patient's head on your lap and position it near the floor so that your work is visible, because this operation is delicate and small.
E aprop intromet la agulha en la razit del pel ajustat la qual ha necessitat de engen, e fay aquela penetrar en la palpebra festinantment entro que extraguas aquela desus le pel natural.	Insert the needle into the root of the hair that requires surgery and make it penetrate the eyelid quickly but carefully until you extract it above the natural skin.
E aprop tire le pel entro desus e intromet aquel en alixati, e sian les pels un o dos o tres e no mays.	Pull out the hair above and insert the extracted hairs into alum, and let them be one, two or three but not more.
E aprop tira la tua ma am aquel entro que·l pel sia fora-gitat am alixolati en la palpebra am le pel natural.	Pull your hand out with the extracted hairs and put them back into the eyelid with the natural skin.
Mays si es atirat alixalati e non es gitat le pel, atiraras alixati a las partidas dejos am le fiel le qual tu has compost am aquela, entro qu’en sia gitat alixalati del trau sobira.	If the alum has been inserted but not pulled out the hair, pull out the alum at the incision areas with the needle that you have prepared for this purpose, until the alum has been completely removed from above.
E vegas aquela am la visio del huel, quar lahoras tu gitaras alixati e lo fiel, e grotan quascu e clautz le huel, e laysse le claus per dos dias o tres, entro que·l pel adheresca al sieu loc e nasque sobre aquel bona carn.	And you observe the boil with the eye, then you should incise and lance it, and prick it and press the boil, and leave the pus to drain for two or three days until the hair adheres to its place and grows back on that good flesh.
E si es mays breu le pel, lahoras tu ajusta un pel lonc dels pels naturals, e es elevat am aquel, o que·l leysses entro que sia alonguat aprop alcu spazi, e lehoras tu eleva aquel.	If the hair is short, then you adjust a long hair from natural hairs, and raise it up with that, or let it grow until it reaches an appropriate space, and then raise it.
Capitol .xiii.	Capital .13.
De la cura de ehacratir la qual ve en la palpebra desus.	Of the treatment of this eyelid swelling that is above.
Quan ve en le huel ehacratir, e es contraccio de la palpebra quan es contrayta en sus, o a dextra o a sinistra partida, per mala consolidacio de plagua o de seccio o de cauteri, e es apelada leporina, e aquesta ahercrati o es natural o accidental, e es fayta per consolidacio de plagua o de seccios o de cauteri, o per semblantz a lor malcuratz.	When the eyelid swells, and it is contraction of the eyelid when it is contracted on top, either right or left side, due to poor consolidation of a plague or section or burn, and it is called leprosy, and this swelling is natural or accidental, and it is caused by consolidation of a plague or sections or burns, or similar to their bad care.
May la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que tu fendas aquela consolidacio e que separes las labias de lu, e pauses en lu en aquo que es entre aquelas una meca de drap de li, e ligues aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	The manner of operation in it is that you make an incision in that consolidation and separate the lips of it, and place a piece of linen cloth between them, and tie them together until they are healed.
E no cove que tu uses de curacio de lu de las causas las quals exsiccan, constrenho; quar si tu fas aquo retorna alixacratir pus mal que nulh temps no foc habantz.	And it is not necessary to use treatment for the causes that dry up, constrict; because if you do this, it will cause the swelling to return worse and it will not heal at any time.
Usa en aquela de causas que mollifico ayssi cum es fenugrec, e embroca am la aygua en la qual son coytz altea e semensa de li, o enguent dyaquilon, le qual sia liquefayt am alcu dels olis, e submergeys en aquel la meca, e cura am aquel.	Use in that of the causes that soften, such as fenugreek, and wrap with water in which it is cooked and seeds of it, or guaiacol ointment, which is liquefied with one of the oils, and immerse the cloth in it, and heal with it.
E lo tesaur de la tua curacio es que tu perforsses am tot engen que no sia consolidat segon la forma que foc al comensament.	And the treasure of your treatment is that you pierce everything that is not consolidated according to the form that it was at the beginning.
E aquesta operacio la qual havem dita, no es sino alcuna rectificacio de ehalixacrati que no retorna la forma del loc segon que foc denant.	This operation that we have mentioned is not any correction of swelling that does not return the shape of the place according to what it was before.
Capitol .xiiii.	Capital .14.
De la cura de ehacrati le qual es fayt en la palpebra dejos.	Of the treatment of swelling that is made in the lower eyelid.
Aquesta alxacrati la qual es fayta en la palpebra dejos, la qual es nompnada vertadierament alxacrati; e es de lu alcuna natural, autra accidental.	This swelling that is made in the lower eyelid, which is truly called swelling; and it is either natural or accidental.
Mays accidental es fayta per plagua o per scissura o per cauteri o per autres semblantz.	Accidental is caused by a plague or section or burns or similar things.
E la via de la operacio de lu es que tu prenguas una agula en la qual haga fil doble, e fiques aquela en la carn, e que la fassas passar del lacrimal de senestre entro al lacrimal dextre, entro que·l fil pervengua en las doas extremitatz de la carn.	And the method of operation is that you take a needle with double thread and pierce it in the flesh, and make it pass from the left lacrimal to the right lacrimal, until the thread reaches both ends of the flesh.
E aprop exten la carn a las partidas desus am la agula e cus aquela am la agula, e inscideys am spatum ample.	And stretch the skin to the upper divisions with the needle and sew it with the needle, and incise with a broad spatula.
E donc si retorne la figura de la palpebre segon que cove, bo es; e sino, pren le ray e pausa aquel en la figura fenduda, e am aquel converteys la palpebra, e fen las doas fissuras en le latz de la palpebra dejos.	And therefore, if it returns the shape of the eyelid as required, it is good; otherwise, take the root and place it in the divided figure, and with that turn the eyelid, and make two splits on the side of the lower eyelid.
E sian las extremitatz de las doas fissuras de dos angles de la inscizio, la qual has fayta entro que concurren, e sia de lor fayt angle entro que quan se congreguan sia fayta figura de lor.	And the ends of both splits are two angles of the incision, which you made until they converge, and make an angle between them until when they come together is formed a figure of their ends.
E aquesta figura es letra greca: la landa.	And this figure is the Greek letter: lambda.
E aprop osta la carn aquela per la quantitat que es le latz de lu agut dejos de lu, aquo que siec la palpebra.	And stretch the skin that much to the width of the sharp angle below it, so that the eyelid is opened.
E aprop ajusta las partz seperadas e cos aquelas am le fil de lana; e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit de las medicinas mollificativas e de las calguas entro que sia sanat.	And adjust the separated parts and sew them with thread of wool; and heal that with what we have mentioned about the softening medications and poultices until it is healed.
E si alxacrati endeve per fissura o sutura o cauteri, lahoras cove que tu fendas am fissura plana sobre les pels de la palpebra segon que es precedit.	And if the swelling develops due to a split or suture or burn, then it is necessary that you make an incision with a flat cut on the skin of the eyelid as before.
E aprop separa am la calgua entre doas labias segon que havem dit.	And separate the poultice between two lips as we have said.
En la suma del sermo de la cura de alxacrati quan es desus o dejos, que corra en lu operacio, segon que es preparat de la forma de alxacrati, e aquela es en forma de motas diversitatz.	In summary, in the treatment of swelling that is above or below, follow the operation as prepared according to the type of swelling, and that is in the form of diverse motes (small rounded masses).
E le artifexs savi totz temps prepara engen en quascuna manieyra la qual es possibla a lu entro que fassa retornar la figura a la forma natural, o prop de aquela, e aquel malaute segon que a lu conveneys de la operacio e dels strumentz en las majors disposicios.	And the skilled craftsman always prepares means in every way that is possible to return the shape to its natural form or as close as possible, and the patient according to what is appropriate for the operation and tools in the best possible conditions.
Capitol .xv.	Capital .15.
De la adherencia de la palpebra am la conjunctiva o am la cornea.	Of the adhesion of the eyelid to the conjunctiva or cornea.
Quan accideys aquesta consolidacio a motz homes enayssi que sia solidada la palpebra pus desus am le album del huel, e sia prohibida de la facilitat del movement e de las suas obras naturals, donc cove que tu entrometas la extramitat del ray dejos la palpebra, e eleva en sus aquela, o exten aquela am le unci.	When this consolidation occurs in many men whose eyelid is solidly attached above the albumen of the eyelid, and it is prohibited from the ease of movement and its natural workings, then it is necessary that you cut off the external edge of the lower eyelid, raise it up, or stretch it with oil.
E aprop tu inscideys la adherencia am spatum subtil, le qual no sia am acuitat de las inscisios, habantz obtus un petit per so que·l malaute no sia inquietat deves la operacio, e remau le spatum que no ledesca le huel am la sua acuitat.	Approach and incise the adhesion with a thin spatula, which should not be too sharp for the operation, as it has a blunt tip so that the patient is not disturbed by the procedure, and remove the spatula carefully without causing pain to the area.
E sia la tua inscizio quays excorjan aquela adherencia am facilitat entro que sia retornada la palpebra segon la sua forma natural e que sia sanada tota la adherencia.	Let your incision be made gently enough so that the eyelid can return to its natural form and the entire adhesion is healed.
E aprop tu met en le huel aygua salada am la qual tu laves; o distilla en lu de zunia dissolvut en l’aygua.	Then apply salt water to the wound, or distill it in oil of rosin dissolved in water.
E aprop separa entre la palpebra e l’huel am calgua de li, e pausa sobre le huel lana infuza en album de huou, e aprop le tertz jorn usa de causas consolidativas entro que sia sanat.	Approach separating the eyelid from the wound with cold water and place wool soaked in alum of hog on it, and after three days apply healing agents to consolidate it until it is healed.
Capitol .xvi.	Chapter XVI.
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	On incision of nails and removal of the prominence of caruncle tissue.
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu.	Know that nails are of two types: either they are nervous and resemble hard, subtle matter; or they are non-nervous, similar to white, congealed moisture. When you touch it with a probe, it collapses and is separated from the probe without being implanted in it.
E amdos las specias no comensan sino del lacrimal major entro que va petit a petit que cobre la vista e prohibeys le lum e·l movement de huel.	And both types do not start until the larger tear duct covers part of the vision and prevents light and movement of the eye.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en la inscizio de lu es que·l malaute pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop obre les huels de lu, e eleva la palpebra am la tua ma, e aprop colligeys la ungla am onci de pauca duplicacio e exten aquela a las partidas desus.	However, the method of working on the incision is that the patient bends their head towards you and opens their eyes, and you lift the eyelid with your hand, collect the nail with a probe of moderate length and extend it to the incisions above.
E aprop pren una agula e entromet en aquela un pel de cavalh o de buou o de vaqua, o de semblantz, o de fiel fort, o duplica la extremitat de la agulha petit a petit e fica aquela en le mieg de la ungla, e penetra aquela am la agulha, e lia am fiel la ungla; e exten aquela a las partidas desus, e excorja am le pel le latz de la ungla lo qual siec la pupilla.	Then take a needle and pierce through a hair from the horse or ox or cow, or similar animal, or strong iron, or double the tip of the needle little by little and insert it into the middle of the nail, and penetrate it with the needle, and remove the nail; extend it to the incisions above, and excise the hair around the edge of the nail that touches the pupil.
E ayssi tu sieguas aquela am le pel entro al derier de lu.	And in this way, you follow the hair towards the end of the incision.
E aprop tu inscideys le romanent en la razitz del lacrimal am spatum subtil o am petitas forfexs, e leysa la carn del lacrimal natural per so que per inscizio de aquela no endevengua fluxs de lagremas continuabla.	Then you incise the remnant of the tear duct at its root with a thin spatula or small scissors, and excise the natural tissue of the tear duct so that continuous flow of tears is not caused by the incision of it.
E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And at times the nail with only the tip extended or removed, as mentioned above, should be excised with a lion's hair spatula, which is its shape.
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	And take care that the spatula does not touch the corneal tissue and causes a rupture, and that the pupil is perforated.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Make the incision in the eyelid with a little bit of salt or lime made from cinnabar, and leave it for a day, and take care of it with water that should be applied until it is healed.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	And if the nail is not nervous and you cannot insert the needle into it or it collapses with the probe, this type of nail should be cured with medications, and healed in the same way as described above and recommended in the division.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	And if you want to incise it, you open the patient's eye and take a thin lion-shaped spatula with sharpness as follows:
am subtilitat.	with fineness.
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	And if it is rarefied and contracted and enters the tear duct, you distill your own oil of rosin made from sulphur or rosin or salt-water, and place it in the eye for another day.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	And approach the operation repeatedly until everything that is from it has passed, unless the counter-abscess appears in the eye, in which case you should excise it, and treat the abscess at the beginning until it is healed.
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	And approach your operation repeatedly over it with reason until it is healed.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	The prominence of tear duct tissue, if noticed in the eye due to harm, should be stopped with a probe; and incise it from one side, without extending the incision so that tears do not flow.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	And approach distilling oil of rosin made from sulphur in the eye until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	Chapter XVII.
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	On incision of ingrown hair and what is born of skin attached to the eyelid.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	Sometimes in the heels of some people, raw flesh is born and swells up until it covers the pupil or approaches or presses on the eyelids and strongly compresses the eyelids at the outer corners and resembles a rose-bush balustrade.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	The procedure is that the patient holds his head between your hands; and you open the heels of that person and collect all that flesh appropriately with scissors or a knife; and you begin to cut the flesh from the beginning until it is finished with the knife, and be careful not to cut into the heel while you perform the operation.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	Use the incision that you will make or use the spatula that we have recommended in toenail incision, or small forceps with which you can grasp the nail as appropriate according to this chapter.
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	Since your incision is complete and all the flesh has been removed, you fill the heel with saltpeter or distill it into red powder similar to that of corrosive medicines, and place it on the heel covered with alum until it is certain that the wound is cauterized.
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	If there is any cause of inflammation and the wound cauterizes blood, and you fear that it will become cauterized, you must lance the heel and treat the cauterization with whatever causes it to subside, and then apply the operation until it heals, and do the same for the surrounding skin affected by this type of inflammation.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	However, you must ensure that the healing of the heel occurs naturally or by accident, and do not put your hand in any of these operations until you see that the member has suffered enough from this operation.
Capitol .xviii.	Chapter 18.
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	On collecting knowledge in the heel.
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Knowledge is gained from red veins that are hard on the heel and forbid clothing to apply any pressure on it, and uncover the heel for days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel. E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And it is that you command the patient to hold his head between your hands and suspend those veins with a thumb or a finger according to your discretion; and the thumb should be of subtle doubling in this way:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	or two thumbs gently in the body like this:

E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas. E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	When you have completed [the procedure], then distill in the wound the green or red vinegar to dissolve what is congested with pus.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	If it is not possible for you to gather everything at that time, then collect all the pus and cover it with something that eases the pain of the wound, and leave it for several days until the pain is alleviated and the abscess is securely cauterized.
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat the procedure as necessary until it heals.
E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	And this is the form of the forceps:
Capitol .xix.	Capital XIX
De reduccio de arizati al nas.	On the reduction of arising nosebleeds.
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	When treating a nosebleed with cautery or acute burning medicine as described earlier and it is not healed, do not be deceived but rather make an incision on the abscess when it matures, and extract all the humidity that is in it and pierce the bone until it is exposed.
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	Therefore, when the bone is exposed and you see corruption or blackness in it, scrape it with an instrument that has this form:
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	It is called a sharp-headed instrument, made of iron and rounded like an ass's head that is pierced by a punch with a small hole (such as shown in the following form).

E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	Let it be done for several observations, and then restore the area with drying and stiffening agents.
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	If the area is consolidated and good flesh has grown there and it is separated from the body for 40 days without being renewed or developing an abscess or any accident happening, then you will know that it is healed.
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	If not, do not be deceived but rather reduce the fracture to the shape of the nose, and proceed as follows: First, you should discover the bone using forceps or acute medicine, and when the bone is exposed, you take three pieces as shown below:
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	The handle of the forceps should be triangular in shape and its shaft should be extended to the tip as shown sometimes.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	Place that one on the bone and it should be the lacrimal piece; extend your hand a little from the wound, and turn your hand with the three pieces until they penetrate the entire bone, and the patient will feel pressure as the vent closes when you apply your hand to it.
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	Therefore, you should restore the area with drying and stiffening agents as directed.

Capitol .xx.	Capital XX
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	On the reduction of the swelling of the nose.
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	When the nose swells completely and no harm or diminution occurs from this, you should make the patient lie down and follow these instructions: keep them quiet without strain or injury and use good suction; apply a linen poultice to the swelling that is made of catnip, aloe, elder, and colocynth, and strengthen the bandage over the nose without powder.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	The method for the powders is to take fourfold strips of lion's wool and make powder from them.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	Then place one on top of another according to the amount that the patient needs.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	Strengthen one over the other with a thick and strong binding, then apply cupping glasses with suction without cutting, and remove the cupping glasses and let the wound heal during the day and night.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	But if the ligament becomes softened in the meantime, then it must be tied more tightly.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	Then return the ligament during the day and night as previously stated.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	If the wound has already been reduced (healed), that is good; if not, continue applying the plaster, powder, binding, and cupping until it is healed.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter XXI.
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	On the incision of the prominence of the uveal tunica.
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	When there is a disruption in the uveal tunica and it becomes prominent, proceed outside the eyelids as if with a grain of sand, shape it like a man, and if you want to incise (make an incision), perform the operation as previously recommended, by entering the needle into the uvea from the lower part towards the upper part, and then place another needle in the area where there is double thread (the lacrimal duct) and make it penetrate and leave the first needle in place according to its position; then incise the area of the double thread and lift the part of the uvea around the needle, and tighten that area.
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	Then remove the needle and place it on the cotton wool soaked in oil and wait until the thread comes out with the grape.
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	And then care for the wound with something that supports it until the ulcer is healed.
E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	After some time, put a circle of fabric around the entire wound and adjust it to cover the prominent area, then perforate (pierce) with a thin spatula that reaches the underside of the wound and let the whitish substance (the aqueous humor) flow out and descend immediately.
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	Then tighten until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter XXII.
De curacio de alconati.	On treating conjunctivitis.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This disease that is called conjunctivitis is not only an inflammation, but it is also an infection similar to water flowing down (running) and not just that.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	But the method of working on it is that you have the patient sit with their head straight and properly supported (reclined) on a seat or bench, and then take hold of the head with both hands from two sides and bring it towards the affected side to see the infection reach the opposite side, and make sure it dries up and does not descend, and keep the eye open, and have the patient watch the process as they used to.
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	And if it does not descend, know that it is water (discharge).
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	But if the descent of the discharge is not prepared with what has been said, then have the patient sit between your hands and take a thin spatula and place it on the conjunctiva near the cornea at the cornea's edge (the limbus), until the discharge is pushed out.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel. E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And it should be treated with other causes until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter XXII.
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	On treating watery discharge from the eye.
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat. Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	You must have the patient sit between your hands on a chair and hold their head steady, keeping it straight.

And when it is dry and does not descend, then you extract the limb easily, and rotate your hand slightly at a time, and dissolve a small amount of clear salt gemma and water in it, and wash the inside of the eye with this; and apply outside the eye cotton or stopper or infused wool and oil rose and alum and ligature with water the eye.

Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	However, it is necessary to remove this because water can easily and violently flow out due to great and strong gazing.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	However, if there is an abscess, you must remove the eyelid after seven days and correct it with something that dissolves abscesses.

E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua. Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	However, we have not seen this done on our land, nor do we find it in any of the ancient books; and it is possible that it is new.

Capitol .xxiv.	Capital XXIV.
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	From the healing of flesh, do not take anything in the nose.
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	When various fleshy growths are born in the nose, some of which are caused by the type of scorpion motez pes or polyp feet; and this disease is called polyps because it resembles that foot represented.
